snippet: S.&.P.’s settlement ends a heated, two-year fight with regulators. | President Obama’s corporate tax reform irks the business world. | Slump in oil prices brings pressure. | Ally chief steps down.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: The Road to S.&P.'s Settlement
